Lindenmayer Systems

By Daniel Kuebrich

Quick Start

Under the Rules tab, press the Calculate button. Then start the simulation by pressing the Play button.

What is This?

Lindenmayer Systems (or L-systems) are rule production systems which generate patterns common in plant structures and fractals. tree structures and fractals) commonly seen. More on L-Systems

Usage

There are many examples available.
  • Under the Rules tab, click Load to load a ruleset. Example rulesets are located in the mason/sim/app/lsystem directory. Alternatively, enter your own ruleset by hand.
  • If you like, change the number of expansions and the initial seed, and click Calculate to expand the rules into the symbol string.
  • If you like, under the Draw tab, change the angle and the distance (the length of each line), and press the Set button.
  • Press the play button on this console to interpret the symbol string and draw the result.
